trends: There has been one other sighting in Muskegon Township
There were no other sightings in Muskegon Township on or around March 19th 2012
Summary: My son observed object with his sister and boyfriend. It flew north to south.
divs: Sighting DetailsJust returned home. Looking out the living room window my sister said here comes a ufo as we looked north and she was just kidding. As we watched the object get closer we went outside and noticed not a sound like you would here from a airplane. As it went over head it made a whirring sound. It was triangle shaped with three lights. My son states he was excited. My daughter will not talk about it. Lost sight of this object as it kept going south and trees got in the way.
